message: Let's start with a fair split. I'll give you $250,000. Your turn!
I'll give you a decent offer, but I'm not being too generous yet. Your turn to counter!
That's still too lopsided. I'll try to get a better deal.
I'll meet you in the middle. $550,000 for me, $450,000 for you. Take it or leave it!
I'll give you a slightly better offer, but I'm still trying to get the better end of the deal. Your turn to counter!
Still too skewed towards you. I'll try to get a fairer deal.
Let's split it 50/50. No more games, no more negotiations. Just a fair split.
